channel.title: bar seating • solo dining on courtside nyc
channel.description: Recent content in bar seating • solo dining on courtside nyc

item.title: the york
item.description: thoughts low-key bar with a good burger

item.title: fairfax
item.description: thoughts sit & yap menu highlights burger gnocchi

item.title: nura
item.description: thoughts refreshingly high ceilings menu highlights japanese sweet potato crudo

item.title: san sabino
item.description: thoughts excellent menu highlights spicy tuna manicottini gelato

item.title: maison premiere
item.description: menu highlights oysters

item.title: moody tongue
item.description: thoughts known for beer menu highlights crudos v good

item.title: eavesdrop
item.description: thoughts def need a res food surprisingly good menu highlights cold sesame noodles

item.title: minetta tavern
item.description: thoughts a classic

item.title: llama inn
item.description: thoughts easy to get a res menu highlights snow peas lamb sausage

item.title: penny
item.description: thoughts delightful menu highlights wine list goes crazy

item.title: bangkok supper club
item.description: thoughts open kitchen unique cocktails menu highlights hokkaido scallop ceviche pork jowl bangkok gai yang

item.title: panzón
item.description: thoughts back garden makes a mean margartia

item.title: cervo's
item.description: thoughts everything is good, not a single miss

item.title: cecchi's
item.description: thoughts when dinner is the night out want to take anyone and everyone i know here menu highlights pork chop cheesecake

item.title: b&h dairy
item.description: thoughts different deal every day of the week menu highlights tuna melt

item.title: revelie luncheonette
item.description: thoughts would go just to hang with eric again walk-in only menu highlights green chile cheeseburger chopped cheese egg sandwich

item.title: domo domo
item.description: thoughts when the sushi craving hits and needs to be resolved asap but there’s cheaper + better omakase

item.title: figure eight
item.description: menu highlights long beans sun chokes corn jalepeño bolobao

item.title: l'antica pizzeria da michele
item.description: menu highlights arancini

item.title: office of mr. moto
item.description: thoughts dining experience, highly recommend the pairing as well post dinner drinks in the downstairs bar was a major highlight books out month in advance - need to be ready when resys drop @ 10 am on the first of the month

item.title: cafe mogador
item.description: east village williamsburg thoughts east village classic menu highlights amba (side sauce)

item.title: superiority burger
item.description: thoughts walk-in only. get here just before it opens for an early dinner. bar in the back - serves pints of ice cream and burgers late nite do not skip dessert menu highlights can’t go wrong

item.title: seoul salon
item.description: thoughts walk-in bar seating menu highlights pancake fried chicken

item.title: foxface
item.description: thoughts been going to foxface since their sandwich shop window days - always got to try something fun and interesting first time i ever had rabbit was on a sandwich from here. their restaurant is no different, delicious & unique menu highlights try something you’ve never heard of before, you’ll probably love it

item.title: rosella
item.description: thoughts tough reservation, but saw several people walk in right when it opened, so great for walk-in early dinner menu highlights dragonfly house salad we also got something with apples that was insance, but i think that dish might be seasonal

item.title: ippudo
item.description: thoughts two locations one in the east village and another in hell’s kitchen save some tables for walk-ins menu highlights karaka spicy bao buns & shisitos

item.title: aria
item.description: thoughts sit at the bar
